summary: REQ-1 asks to resolve deployment-blocking errors so a fresh full-stack deploy succeeds. The diff shows substantial backend and frontend application changes (authorization/profile APIs, routing/provider restructuring) but provides no clear evidence of fixing a specific compile/build/config/deploy error or of changes targeted at deployment stability. Several changes also look like new functionality rather than deployment fixes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Resolve any errors that prevent a successful deploy so the full stack (Motoko canister + React frontend assets) builds and deploys cleanly; fix the underlying cause of prior compile/build/config errors (not just re-run).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show any explicit fixes to deployment/build configuration or specific compile errors (e.g., dfx config, canister settings, build scripts, dependency/version fixes). It only shows application-level code changes without evidence they address the prior deployment-blocking issue or ensure a clean deploy.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend user profile storage and profile APIs with access control/authorization mixin.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1 (which is limited to deployment stability). These are product/API features rather than clearly deployment-error fixes.

hallucinated_features.description: New/changed frontend routing setup using @tanstack/react-router and reorganized provider/layout composition (DesignBAppShell, ThemeProvider, QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, Toaster).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 does not request a routing refactor or design system/layout changes; this appears to be functionality/architecture work beyond deployment-error resolution (unless tied to an error, which is not evidenced in the diff).

hallucinated_features.description: Introduction/expansion of “Design B” theming system and multiple new pages/features (e.g., HomeDashboard metrics UI, DoctorList, AppointmentDetails) as described in the file summaries.
hallucinated_features.reason: These are new UI/product features unrelated to the stated non-goal and not required by REQ-1 for deployment stability; also the diff evidence indicates broad feature work beyond deployment fix scope.
